samples.prompt:
Human:How do you prevent tooth enamel loss?Assistant:Tooth enamel loss is a common condition that affects most people’s teeth at some point in their life. Tooth enamel is the hard protective coating that covers the surfaces of your teeth. The outer surface of the enamel is shaped like a triangle with a point at the tip, and it’s covered by a layer of enamel that’s slightly less hard. If the enamel coating gets worn away, it exposes the underlying softer dental tissue, called dentin, which has the same texture as bone. At this point, it’s possible to bite into the dentin, which can cause painful sensitivity to hot and cold foods. If the exposed dentin isn’t protected by enamel, your tooth can eventually fall out, or it may become so sensitive that it needs to be removed.

How to prevent enamel loss

To prevent enamel loss, you can take steps to reduce the amount of acid that your teeth come into contact withHuman:Should I brush more often?Assistant:Yes, you should brush your teeth twice a day, at least, with toothpaste that contains fluoride. In fact, studies have shown that toothbrush users who are aged 5 or older can reduce their risks of cavities by about half if they brush their teeth two or more times a day and with the right toothpaste. Fluoride helps protect the outer enamel layer of your teeth by strengthening the material.Human:Thanks, I will get a toothpaste that includes fluoride.Assistant:
samples.chosen: Great! You could also visit your dentist to have your teeth checked. If you can afford it, the dentist may also offer dental treatment to improve your enamel, or prevent cavities, such as a fluoride treatment, a filling, or perhaps a tooth extraction. It’s important to discuss treatment options with your dentist and remember that prevention is often more effective than relying on dental treatment.
samples.policy: No problem! If you're worried that you may need to get a filling or braces, you should always visit your dentist. While whitening agents and other substances can help improve the appearance of your teeth over time, they can also make them more difficult to clean, which can lead to even more dental pain. Your dentist can work with you to develop a treatment plan that works for you.

samples.prompt: Human:My friend recently broke his back in a motorcycle accent and is now confined to a wheelchair. He lost his job as a mechanic and I'm trying to help him reskill so he can work from home more or at least start looking for work in an office environment as he feels manual jobs are beyond him right now. He has a kid to support so I'm willing to finance his retraining and he can pay me back once he is able to. What sorts of jobs should he be looking at and what skills or qualifications should would he need for each. The jobs have to be disabled friendly.Assistant:I see. For jobs requiring manual work I'm sorry to hear about the extent of your friend's injury, but he can probably still do a lot of computer work and data entry jobs, especially as a home based position. He could also work as a website designer. Another possibility is programming, he could work as a junior web developer. He can use some disabled friendly machines such as a wheelchair, a voice dictation system, etc. Also, if he is unable to physically attend an office job, he could work from home as a freelancer. He can still use the internet and email to connect with customers, he could find work with local businesses and not be limited to international jobs, etc.Human:He's paraplegic so has use of the upper half of his body. It would be preferable if he could work from home because of his daughter as he is the sole parent. He's pretty good with numbers so how would something like data entry work for him? Are there resources we can check to see what he has to do to get qualified and where to look for employment?Assistant:
samples.chosen: If you're talking about the type of work that entails writing and inputting details using the computer, your friend is in luck. It is an in demand field, even for paraplegics. So if he had a computer and internet access, it should be feasible for him to take up work from home as a web developer or data entry clerk. Many employers also tend to have flexible working hours so it might be easier for him to work with a remote worker. He could also take up jobs like web designing, social media marketing and digital marketing, etc. Again, it doesn’t have to be for a company, but also self-employed type jobs that a paraplegic can do are available.
samples.policy: You're right - it would be much more difficult for him to access a full-time job. He would most likely need to learn to drive, a few hours per day would be sufficient, but that's just a tip. He would most likely have trouble typing but if he learned to get better at typing it will go a long way in helping him access jobs. He can probably work as a web developer but will require some special training on a website to allow for use of a keyboard, for example. It would also be helpful if he worked with people like my friend and learned to speak some commands that require physicality as well. If his disability is very severe it would be impossible to use some of the websites like Google or Bing as well, so you might consider looking into something that allows for that. For example if he needs to do a lot of medical transcription he might need to work with people like those in the medical field, or some sort of medical device company that works with the medical profession. It would probably be best to look into companies that provide computer jobs for people like him and have some of the skills he needs. For example if he needs to do a lot of computer work he might need to work in a field such as design, graphic work or data entry. You can also try to find opportunities for jobs with organizations that need individuals with disabilities and for these organizations to work with people with disabilities, that would make the process of finding and applying for a job in that way easier, even if they are not as accessible as an employer. You might want to consider checking with companies with disability access and job postings.  If he's not interested in that work and wants to return to his family, he can find work in home health care with his current employer. Home care jobs are a very popular area of work. They can be a lot more challenging, though, they require a lot of physical activity and often are for people with a high level of mobility, not a disability like the one he's experiencing. That is not to say that you can't look into job opportunities in home care, such as nursing homes, assisted living, or home based nursing care. If he's interested in those types of jobs, he should consider looking for an employer that meets or exceeds their standards in providing the care he needs to be able to keep up with life. For example if he's interested in helping older adults with mobility issues, his employer should meet or exceed the standards in home care.

Great! Now let's get started. To make homemade peanut butter, you’ll need the following ingredients:

1. Peanuts
2. Food processor
3. Jar lid
4. Spatula
5. Tall glass

Follow these simple instructions:

1. Gather the ingredients: Peanuts, a food processor, a jar lid, and a spatula.

2. Grind the peanuts: Using a food processor, grind the peanuts until they are finely chopped. This will make it easier to get the perfect texture of your peanut butter.

3. Pour peanut butter in the jar: Using a spoon, pour the peanut butter into the jar. The jar is so small, it doesn’t need any fillers or seal.

4. Seal the jar: Place the jar lid on the jar and use the spatula to squeeze any air out of the peanut butter. Make sure to do this while shaking the jar to prevent any air bubbles from forming.

samples.prompt: Human:Hi, I'd like to learn how to play racquetball. Can you explain the game to me?Assistant:

Sure! A racquetball court is almost like a swimming pool: you’re inside, with a net going around the side walls. Instead of swimming or floating, though, you’re hitting a ball with a racquet. And instead of jumping and diving, you’re leaping and slamming.

The game is a lot of fun! You have a racquet and the ball, and you’re trying to keep the ball from hitting the walls or ceiling of the court. You can control the ball with your racquet, and also you can control it with your body.

The rules are pretty straightforward. You win the point when you hit the ball so that it passes through the square ring on the front wall of the court, called the “front wall string”. If you miss that, you lose the point.

The game lasts for 11 points. In case of a tie, the players play an extra point.

Each player starts with 2 balls. During each point, a player has 1 ball.

Certainly! Racquetball is a simple game with a lot of variations and can be played by people of all ages and skill levels. The main objective is to return the ball back to your opponent's location, typically with a small margin of error. It's also known as a shuttlecock game.

Racquetball can be played on a court or on the ground, and there are a wide variety of rules and variations. Some of the most common rules are:

* The ball is thrown over and under the net.
* The ball must be struck with the bat or a racket.
* The ball can be thrown at different speeds.
* The ball can be thrown over and under the center of the court.
* The ball can be thrown on the ground, as well as on the surface.

If you would like to learn more about racquetball, I can recommend some online resources like Youtube, ESPN, ESPN.com, etc. You can also play against other players on the internet or through tournaments. Best of luck with your racquetball training!

A tree’s wood becomes denser as it age. Then, its wood becomes lighter and thinner as it gets smaller. This process gives it a characteristic “woodward” appearance. Eventually, a tree’s wood starts to give way and its trunk loses it’s strength. When that happens, the tree is no longer able to support its own weight. It’s time for the tree to break apart and fall down.  1. When a tree is cut, what does the tree grow into? A: The wood that is now in use. B: The water in a creek. The hunting season can last from 5 weeks to a few months or a year. Hunting limits are set for the availability of any prey, as well as for any predator. For example, hunting deer, bison, or elk, is not a good option because, in most areas, these animals are too rare to be hunted without losing.  Hunting seasons for certain animals, such as bison or whitetail deer, may have fewer restrictions than others. Additionally, the hunting season for certain animals, such as whitetail deer, may be seasonal, meaning the hunting limit will not be an ongoing pattern.  For the most part, the hunting season in the US lasts during the winter months, and will only be open during the hunting season. samples.policy:
Of course! Here's a recipe for Mexican street corn:

Ingredients:
- 1 can of corn, drained and rinsed
- 1/2 cup of chipotle peppers in oil, diced
- 1/2 cup of pineapple, diced
- 1/2 cup of diced tomatoes
- 1/4 cup of water
- 2 tablespoons of lime juice
- 1/4 teaspoon of cumin
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. Preheat your grill to medium-high heat.
2. Cut the corn off the corn cob, and remove the husk.
3. In a small bowl, mix together the chopped veggies and taco seasoning.
4. Brush the corn with the corn oil and season with salt and pepper.
5. Grill the corn on all sides, turning occasionally, until the corn is crispy and slightly charred. 6. Serve with toppings of your choice, such as salsa, guacamole, and sour cream. Enjoy!

samples.prompt: Human:I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Mexican drinks. Can you give me a recipe for Horchata?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Here’s the recipe:

Ingredients

6 cups of whole milk

4-5 tbsps. of ground cinnamon

2 tbsps. of ground rice

6-8 rice cakes, crushed

8-10 rice cakes, cut in small cubes

2-3 diced apples

2-3 diced bananas

1-2 grated carrots

1-2 tablespoons of rice, floured

Directions

Simmer over medium heat for 5 minutes.

Remove from heat and allow to cool.

Add the diced fruit and the diced carrots.

Serve in glasses with rice cakes and cinnamon.
samples.policy:
Horchata is a sweet Mexican drink made with corn, sugar and water. Here's a simple recipe for Horchata.

Ingredients:
- 1 cup water
- 1 cup corn kernels
- 1/2 cup sugar
- 2 tablespoons rum or other spirit
- Ice

Instructions:
1. Bring a small pot of water to a boil. 2. In a large pot, bring the water and corn together. 3. Once the water is boiling, remove the pot from the heat and let it simmer for about 5-10 minutes. 4. Strain the water into a medium-sized container. 5. Discard the corn kernels. 6. Add the sugar and rum or other spirit to the container. 7. Bring the sugar and water to a boil. 8. Let the mixture simmer for a few minutes. 9. Strain the mixture again and set aside. 10. To serve, pour the Horchata into a glass and top with a dollop of whipped cream or ice cream. Enjoy!

samples.prompt: Human:I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Indonesian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Soto Ayam?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Sure, here’s a recipe for Soto Ayam (chicken soup with rice):

Ingredients:
- 2 tbsp. Coconut oil
- 500g Chicken breast, cubed
- 3 tbsp. Tamarind paste, as required
- 3 tbsp. Toasted (dry-roasted) coconut, as required
- 1 medium-sized Chicken stock cube, dissolved in 1-litre of water
- Salt and black pepper to taste
- 2-3 cups of cooked Jasmine rice, for serving

Method:

First, in a large soup-pan, heat the coconut oil over a medium-high heat. Add the chicken cubes to the pan, and fry for about 10-12 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked. Add the tamarind paste to the pan and stir, and let the paste simmer until it has thickened and is no longer cloudy. This should take about 5-10 minutes. Add the coconut, and stir thoroughly, cooking for another minute or two. Turn the heat down to medium low, and add the chicken stock and some salt and pepper. Simmer for about 5-7 minutes. Add the rice and serve!
samples.policy:
Certainly! Here's a quick recipe for Soto Ayam:

Ingredients:

* 2 kilos of chicken
* 2 cups of water
* 1/4 cup of sugar
* 2 tablespoons of vinegar
* 1/2 teaspoon of nutmeg
* 1/4 teaspoon of cayenne pepper
* 2 lemons, sliced
* 2 tablespoons of sugar
* 1/4 cup of fresh cilantro leaves, chopped
* 2 tablespoons of lime juice

Instructions:

1. Begin by preparing the chicken. Rinse and dry the chicken thoroughly in a colander, then season it with salt and pepper. Then, pat it dry with paper towels.
2. Mix together 2 cups of water and 1/4 cup of sugar in a small bowl. Add 2 tablespoons of vinegar, 1/2 teaspoon of nutmeg, and 1/4 teaspoon of cayenne pepper. Add the chicken to the mixture and mix well.
3. Cut a lemon into 8 small pieces and add them to the mixture. Let it sit at room temperature for a few minutes so that the lemon pieces set evenly.
4. Once the mixture is ready, add the sliced lemons to it and mix well. Heat it on medium heat until the lemons start to turn pink.
5. Add a small amount of water to each piece of chicken. Mix well to ensure that all of the chicken is in the lemon mixture. If needed, use a spoon or spatula to scrape the chicken pieces out of the lemon mixture.
6. Heat the chicken mixture in a pan until it is thickened, but not browned. Season with 1 tablespoon of sugar, 1/4 cup of fresh cilantro leaves, 2 tablespoons of lime juice, and 1/4 teaspoon of cayenne pepper. Serve hot, with rice or noodles as a side dish.

Enjoy your delicious Soto Ayam!

samples.prompt: Human:How can I help my new cat get accustomed to her new home more quickly? And how can I make her feel as comfortable as possible?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
A few helpful tips are:

- Provide your cat with a ‘sanctuary room’ in which she can safely retreat from other dominant household members and recover from stress - a quiet, enclosed place to eat and sleep. The best low-stress food for a newly-arrived cat is solid dry food, particularly low-salt varieties such as Nutro Choice. Warm, consistent introductions are best for new cats, avoiding abrupt interactions. Take things slowly and help the new cat feel safe and accepted by proactively attending to her and reducing stress with calm handling and comforting words.
- Introduce your cat to the new home environment with a calm and non-traumatic approach. Assemble or acquire gradual introductions - food, toys, bedding - that can be presented more gradually over a period of days, starting with the cat’s bedding, then the rest.

In general, respect your cat’s need for privacy, with quiet and consistent interactions. Regularly provide calm, low-stress petting and physical affection. These interventions will help your cat adjust to her new home with as little stress as possible. To help your cat feel safe, make the pet area as consistent in appearance and aroma as possible, with consistent mealtimes and home routines for the cat. All these interventions can help acclimate your feline new arrival within as little time as possible, but also remember it may take anywhere between three to six weeks for your cat to feel fully acclimated to her new home. Please watch carefully for signs of stress during this period and seek help or contact your vet if you are concerned or distressed about the welfare of your cat.
samples.policy:
To help your new cat get accustomed to her new home, you can start by providing her with a comfortable place to sleep. You can also help her get used to some basic rules, like letting her out for the first few days, and letting her explore the room. As she gets more comfortable, you can offer her more space and playtime. You can also help her adjust to her new routine by putting her down at regular hours.

If your cat is having trouble settling in, you can try adjusting her food or water preferences. For example, you can try changing her food a little bit every day or giving her a bit more playtime each day. And you can also try letting her out for a few hours in her new home, to help her feel more comfortable.

To make her feel more comfortable, you can also try moving her around a little bit. She may need to move around a little to get used to her new home. And you can also try to make her feel more at ease by giving her some treats or toys to play with. Try keeping her in one room for a while, and then move her around in smaller rooms, so she doesn't feel so overwhelmed.

Human:What if my cat doesn't seem to be adjusting well?What should I do?

Assistant: If your cat doesn't seem to be adjusting well, here are some suggestions:

1. Check with your vet: A vet can check your cat's behavior and recommend a treatment plan to improve her situation. They may suggest medication, or they may recommend a more specialized diet.

2. Ask for advice: Talk to other cat owners in your community and ask for their advice. They may be able to identify a reason why your cat is not adjusting well and can provide guidance on how to help her adjust.

3. Consider socialization: Socialization is important for cats, so consider taking your cat to a cat-sitter or a pet sitting service to help her socialize. This can also help her learn new things and improve her overall socialization skills.

4. Keep an eye out: Pay attention to your cat's behavior and look for any signs that she may be feeling stressed or scared. If she is constantly scratching on surfaces or has become confused about her new home, this may be a sign that she is not adjusting well.

Ingredients:

2-3 Tbsp olive oil, plus more for brushing

2 tbsp thyme, chopped

4 cloves garlic, chopped

Directions:

In a cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat, add the olive oil. Rub the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Place the chicken in the skillet and sear on each side. samples.prompt: Human:Is there a simple reason why human skin is so much weaker than nearly all animal skin? Even if you compare us to primates, we have thinner flesh. Did we develop this way due to domestication or were our distant ancestors like this even when they lived in the wilderness?Assistant:Human skin does indeed have a relatively thin and fragile structure, which makes it especially vulnerable to human injury and disease. But our macroevolutionary starting point was the tough and thickly skinned animals that lived in the wild. Over the course of humans’ evolution, our skin evolved to become thinner, less hair-covered and more sensitive, due to selection for skin that is more flexible and energy-efficient in human societies. Human skin evolved to become more fine-grained to help us adapt to tool use, larger exchange of information through symbols and other cultural developments, and decreased exposure to environmental hazards. However, this increase in sensitivity leads us to be more delicate and to develop skin diseases more easily. This is likely an evolutionary trade-off due to the advantages of our cultural development.Human:What is our closest ancestor that we know of who likely had tougher flesh?Assistant:
samples.chosen: The ancient non-human primates that gave rise to humans and modern humans are primates with relatively sparse and patchy body hair, soft-to-very-soft shallow-layered skin, and thin-boned limbs. The common ancestor of humans and chimpanzees, for example, which lived between 6 and 8 million years ago, was likely covered in vegetative body hair and had thicker and stronger skin than humans, but with other important similarities to modern humans such as a bipedal stance and very flexible our hands.
samples.policy: One possibility is that our closest ancestor, our Homo erectus, likely had more skin than us because the other members of our species (e.g. chimpanzees) tend to be less developed and more vulnerable to disease. We also suggest that they likely had a greater number of body hair, which helps to reduce the number of scratches we can get on our skin. Perhaps they had a greater degree of socialization (such as using animal horns for hunting instead of a human hair comb) which also helped reduce skin sensitivity.

, especially if it is left untreated. 
Mineral water: as implied by the name, mineral water is pulled from a mineral spring, which is full of minerals like sulfur, magnesium, and calcium. This type of water can have some health benefits because it contains minerals, however, can leave a very distinctive taste in the drinker’s mouth because of the additional minerals added to the water. 
Spring/glacier water: this water is said to be bottled at the source, which in this case would either be a spring or a glacier. Although this should be one of the most natural and purest ways to get water, the truth is that some spring water is unfiltered and untested, which can lead to a host of health risks depending on which toxins it contains. 
Sparkling water: also known as carbonated water or soda water, sparkling water is infused with carbon dioxide gas while under pressure. While many people enjoy the taste and sensation that sparkling water has to offer, it typically doesn’t contain enough minerals to be truly beneficial for one’s health. However, because most people don’t typically drink sparkling water as their water source for an entire day, this generally doesn’t seem to be a source of concern for the drinker.
Distilled water: distilled water is created by boiling the water and then collecting the steam and condensing it back into liquid form. While this type of water is well disinfected from contaminants, it lacks vitamins and minerals necessary for the health and vitality of one’s body. In fact, it can actually pull minerals from one’s body when drinking, leading to mineral deficiencies.
Purified water: although this water may seem extremely pure and clean because of the name, it is usually just tap or groundwater that has been disinfected from harmful contaminants and bacteria. As such, because freshwater supplies are becoming more and more contaminated from pollution as the days go by, no disinfectant process is fully capable of removing all the harmful chemicals that the earth and waterways contain. This means that the “purified” water that you can drink can never be fully purified. 
Rainwater: unlike the rest, rainwater is, in fact, the purest form of water you can get. Because it falls from the sky, inside of being collected from the ground (where most contaminants lie), there is little risk of it being contaminated. Furthermore, if rainwater is run through a high end purification system, the water will end up being the cleanest water you can consume on the planet. "Assistant:

While spring and glacier water are purest, mineral water can still have some health benefits, and sparkling water is said to be bottled at its source. Purified water is disinfected from harmful contaminants, and rainwater is the purest source of water you can get. Johannes Bach's father also had the first name "Johann Sebastian", and it is customary in German families to give the eldest son the same first name as his father, followed by the name of the father's father (i.e. the grandfather's name). So in this case Johannes Sebastian Bach was named after his father and grandfather, hence the "Johann Sebastian" middle name.

samples.prompt: Human:How do they calculate the CPI?Assistant:If you’re asking about the Consumer Price Index, I can offer an explanation. The CPI is a measure of inflation, and is calculated on the basis of a monthly sample of consumer prices collected by the US Bureau of Labor Statistics.Human:Can you tell me more about how the consumer price sample works for the CPI?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Yes, it’s based on an index of all goods and services used by the consumers, including food, energy, shelter, and clothing. All prices are re-set to a base year, which is currently 1982.
samples.policy: When it comes to the Consumer Price Index, the sample of prices collected is actually a little complicated. This is because in the US, consumers pay for a variety of different goods and services at different rates, depending on their purchasing habits. The CPI therefore takes into account these varying prices for various products, with each sample of consumer prices having some variation in the amount they are collected. This way, it’s not possible to provide an exact value for the CPI. However, it is important to note that it is always possible to include an “intermittent period” for the CPI, and this means that for some months of the year, the CPI will be higher than others, and thus the index will be closer to its expected value.

The eggs will start to set up right away, but you want to keep them moving continuously, so the egg mixture stays hot and the eggs stay fluffy. At this point you can start adding some vegetables, if you like. If you want to make them a little more interesting, you might try grated asparagus or some chopped spinach, or you might try sautéed mushrooms or bell peppers.

samples.policy:
To make fluffy scrambled eggs, you need to follow these steps:

1. Crack some eggs into a bowl.
2. Add salt, pepper, and any other spices you want, such as turmeric, cumin, or chili powder.
3. Pour the eggs into the bowl and stir well to combine.
4. Use an electric mixer to speed up the egg mixture until it is smooth and creamy.
5. To make the eggs fluffy, fold in some chopped vegetables or herbs, such as mushrooms, spinach, or diced onions.
6. Enjoy your fluffy scrambled eggs!

Human:How to get a fluffy scrambled egg to be hard and firm?Assistant
To get a fluffy scrambled egg to be hard and firm, you can follow these simple steps:

1. First, make sure your eggs are fresh and not too old. If your eggs are old or overcooked, they won't be fluffy when you cook them.
2. Cut your eggs into small, manageable pieces, like 8-10 slices.
3. Beat the eggs in a bowl with an electric mixer until they are soft and creamy.
4. Add some chopped vegetables or herbs to the beaten eggs, such as peas, carrots, or celery, to make the eggs softer and more flavorful. You can also add some spices, such as ground cumin or chili powder, to give your scrambled eggs a more complex flavor.
5. Use an electric mixer to speed up the egg mixture until it is smooth and creamy. If you need to add salt or other seasonings, you can add them in the last few minutes of mixing, but it's best to not add them in the whole mixing process.
6. Use the egg mixture as the base for your scrambled eggs. Pour the scrambled eggs onto a baking sheet, and cook on the middle rack of the oven for 4-5 minutes until they are firm and golden.
7. Remove the eggs from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

It’s also very important to try to make feeding schedules. It is important to note that milk production is not constant and varies from mother to mother, so how much milk your baby is consuming will vary from one day to the next. The most important thing you can do is to feed your baby according to your schedule, as much as you can. 

However, if you are feeding less than you need, your baby is likely not getting enough milk. This is particularly true when you are breastfeeding. Feeding less than your baby needs could mean your baby is only consuming 2/3 of a cup of milk every day, and this is not healthy for her health.

If you find yourself in a situation where you are feeding less than your baby needs, it’s important to consider changing your feed schedule and making adjustments to keep your baby getting enough milk. This may involve adding more or fewer breastmilk to your feeding schedule, and/or adjusting your feeding habits (such as whether or not to feed at the same time every day, or when to feed different times of day).

It’s also important to be aware that the longer you nurse, the less milk you may be producing. This means that if you are feeding less than you need for your baby, you may need to increase your feedings or start supplementing your breastfeeding with formula to support your baby’s growth. 

In summary, your baby’s milk needs may be changing from day to day, and it is important to be aware of these changes and adjust your feeding and nursing schedules accordingly.

samples.prompt: Human:How do I get rid of algae in a pond?Assistant:
samples.chosen: The best way to eradicate algae in a pond is to kill the nutrients that nourish it. A way to do that is to introduce the amphibious fish called the mosquitofish to the pond, as they will eat the algae and grow to a nice size. This is a good alternative to chemical pesticides and is completely natural.
samples.policy:
Algae in a pond can make the water and other aquatic plants look unattractive and unhealthy. There are several methods of removing the algae in a pond. These methods can be applied to a wide variety of different types of ponds, including ponds in the aquatic habitat setting, ponds with ponds, and ponds in natural settings. The methods include:

1. Chemical treatments: In the case of ponds in a natural setting, the algae may be controlled by other forms of plants or natural enemies. Chemical treatments can be a useful tool to use to control the algae in a pond. This may involve the use of chemicals such as diatomaceous earth, which is a powder of calcium carbonate that is used to target algae. These chemicals are effective in controlling the growth of algae and other plants in a pond, but they are expensive to apply to a pond and may not be effective in all cases.
2. Biological treatment: Biological methods such as root-catcher or fumigation, which allow root cells to fall off in certain areas of a pond and capture them, can be used to treat algae in a pond. These methods are relatively easy to apply and can be effective in some cases, but may not be effective in all situations. 3. Irrigation: In the case of ponds in a natural setting, using water to control algae may be effective in some cases. This may be done by installing screens or other barriers to prevent water from flowing into the pond. This can be useful if there is a problem with algae growth, and may help prevent further problem from developing.

In all of the methods mentioned, it is important to work with a knowledgeable professional who can help you determine the best method to use for your specific situation. It is also important to consider the level of plant growth in a pond, as well as the availability and location of natural enemies that may help control algae.

Here is an example of a self-evaluation for your annual review:

**Summary**

I am pleased with my progress in 2014. I have accomplished a significant amount of work during the year, which includes managing the financial reporting team, leading the development of new software products, and supporting business stakeholders. I have improved my communication with business stakeholders and increased the quality of my product documentation.

**Specifics**

- Achieved a large backlog of work during 2014 including: new software development, product documentation, financial reporting, and sales process enhancements
- Maintained positive working relationships with business stakeholders, including all levels of management
- Overhauled the company's financial reporting system, resulting in significant cost savings for the company.
- Led the development of a new software product and implemented it successfully.

**Overall Goals and Objectives**

- Enhance my skill sets in managing financial reporting and sales process
- Increase the quality and quantity of product documentation
- Continue to manage the financial reporting team effectively

**References**

A specific piece of information that can be included to reinforce your self-evaluation is the reason why you were selected to be one of the recipients of the annual review.

That may be one thing you can include. Perhaps you are the best person for the job, or perhaps you were promoted to lead the development of a new software product. Whatever it may be, this information can reinforce your strengths and help you build your case for success in the coming year.

There are a few things you should keep in mind when considering which schools to pursue as a technical career:

1. Technical fields: Consider the specific technical field you are interested in. For example, if you are interested in becoming a web developer, you might be able to find schools offering programs in the field.

3. Job market: Consider the job market for the technical field you are interested in. Look at job descriptions for the schools you are interested in and see which schools have a good track record in the field.

4. Cost: Consider the cost of the schools you are considering. Look for schools with lower tuition or fees, as lower tuition usually means more affordable education.

Based on these considerations, I would recommend considering a combination of technical schools and university programs to earn a degree in the field of your interest. Electric cars offer several benefits over their gas-powered counterparts. Some of them are:

1. Lower Carbon footprint - The carbon emissions produced by gas-powered cars are high. Electric cars consume zero to less carbon compared to gas-powered cars. 2. Reduced Oil Use - Gas-powered cars are mostly fueled by burning a mix of fuel such as diesel or petrol. This type of fuel is usually non-renewable. The use of electric cars is less damaging to the environment and reduce the carbon footprint considerably. 3. Low Maintenance - Electric cars do not need to be oil-refuelled. They do not need oil and have fewer moving parts that increase maintenance cost. 4. Lower Prices - Electric cars are more economical because they do not need gasoline or diesel. They require less maintenance, fuel and have fewer moving parts. 5. Eco-friendly - Since electric vehicles consume less energy, they require less amount of electricity and less greenhouse gas emissions, thus, reducing your carbon footprint. However, the pros are not always so clear for most people. Some might not be able to afford this model or not able to justify the expense. The cons of electric cars are also quite common as they have to be connected to the power grid and require some maintenance to operate. So, most electric car owners have a balance between using the car regularly, reducing fuel costs, and keeping the car battery functioning properly. They also need to understand the cost and benefits of the electric car lifestyle.  98-100% of Tesla owners use electric cars.

For example, if a landlord neglects to tell a tenant that their rental agreement has expired, or if a landowner doesn’t register their deed in a timely manner, the tenant or squatter can sometimes claim rights to the property by default. Let me see if I can find a useful summary of Florida’s squatters’ laws for you to reference.

Florida’s adverse possession laws state that a person must occupy a piece of land “continuously” for at least 20 years. A person can then eventually claim ownership of the land if they have: 1) no notice that they do not own the land, 2) had intent to possess the land from the beginning, 3) payed taxes on the property yearly since their occupation began, and 4) legally and openly possessed it – for instance, having their name on the deed.

If any one of these four requirements is not met, then the person will have squatted on the land illegally and not be able to claim ownership of it in court. Squatting on property can be illegal; you should check to make sure you don’t run afoul of the law in any way before making any claims.

Well, at the most fundamental level of what we’re talking about, we need to stop spending and get more money out of our wallets.

If we’re increasing the price of gasoline, for example, while we’re still increasing our own money, then we’re increasing the price of gasoline, and the price of goods and services is going down. samples.prompt: Human:How can I make time for myself when I'm always busy?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Making time for yourself is a great way to de-stress, relax, and recharge after a long day of work or school! Some tips for making time for yourself include setting aside time each day for hobbies or relaxing activities, carving out time for daily exercise, or scheduling relaxing "me time" every week. You could also try going on vacation once a year, which will give you time to relax and recharge. Additionally, it can be helpful to take short breaks throughout the day to unwind and de-stress, such as listening to music or meditating.
samples.policy:
It can be hard to find the time to take care of yourself when you're always busy, but it's important to remember that your happiness and wellbeing are worth the effort. Here are some tips that might help you relax and de-stress when you're always busy:

1. Set boundaries: Make sure you have time to relax and de-stress by setting boundaries for your time. This means that you need to prioritize your time and set aside specific times each day or week to do things that you enjoy. Don't try to do everything at once.

2. Find activities you enjoy: Identify things you enjoy doing and make a list of them. This will make it easier to spend time doing them, even when you're busy.

3. Plan ahead: Plan ahead for your breaks. Take a few minutes each day to step away from your work and enjoy some quiet time. This could be reading a book, going for a walk, or spending some time with your family.

4. Make time for exercise: Exercise is a great way to relieve stress and improve your mood. Even if you can only do a few minutes of exercise, it's worth it to get moving.

5. Limit social media use: Social media can be a major source of stress and anxiety. Take a break from social media and focus on other activities that bring you joy.

Remember, taking care of yourself is important, and it doesn't have to be all or nothing. Be kind to yourself and make small steps towards self-care.

samples.policy:
Yes, I can help you prepare a meal with some kind of fish. Here is a simple and delicious recipe for pan-fried salmon with vegetables:

Ingredients:
- 2 salmon fillets
- 1 tbsp olive oil
- 1 tbsp lemon juice
- 2 tbsp flour
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 medium zucchini, sliced
- 1 medium yellow squash, sliced
- 1 red bell pepper, sliced
- 1 red onion, sliced

Instructions:

1. Preheat your oven to 400°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
2. Cut the salmon fillets into bite-sized pieces. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Once hot, add the salmon fillets and season with salt and pepper. Cook for about 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
3. In the same skillet, sauté the garlic in a large pan over medium heat for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
4. Add the zucchini, yellow squash, red bell pepper, and red onion to the skillet and sauté for about 2-3 minutes.
5. Add the lemon juice to the skillet and stir to combine. Add the cooked salmon fillets to the skillet and stir to combine.
6. Cook for 2-3 minutes more, or until the vegetables are tender but not too mushy.
7. Once the salmon is fully cooked and the vegetables are tender, drizzle with the honey (if using) and serve immediately.

Enjoy your delicious and healthy meal!

samples.policy:
Removing wood stains such as stain on an old table or wood is a bit like washing your car. Let's just say that before you even start painting, you will need to be sure that the stain is off. As for how to remove stains, here are a few things you may want to consider:

* First, use a lint-free rag to wipe the stain off the surface.
* Once the surface is clean, wait an hour or two to let the stain dry before you start painting.

If you’re using a brush with a small, fine-grit material to apply the paint, you may be able to pull the paint out of the stain with just a little bit of water. If it’s too sticky, you may need to add a small amount of vinegar to loosen the paint. You can also try using a soft-bristled brush or your fingers to pull out the paint.

If you're using an industrial paint or painter’s tape, these may be able to help pull the paint out of the stain.

If you can’t get a good hold of paint with a fine, fine-grit brush or fingers, you may have to sand the surface to remove the stain. Then you can start painting with your standard cleaning products, such as soap and water.

If you’re not sure what to do, it’s a good idea to seek the help of an expert, like a professional plumber or handyman, to get you started. They can guide you through the process and make sure that you’re doing it the right way.

samples.prompt: Human:How do I teach my kids to speak French?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Well I’d recommend that you make it part of their regular school day. And of course, have a lot of conversations in French with them. They’ll have to practice a lot, and get used to making mistakes. They’ll have to get over some of their fears about sounding foolish and having to speak slowly.
samples.policy:
Teaching your children to speak a foreign language can be a challenging experience for many reasons. There are various ways to teach children French, and one of the most effective methods is through face-to-face practice. Here are some tips for teaching your children to speak French:

1. Start early: Teach your children the language from a young age, even before they have the ability to speak or hear other children. Children learn best through play and by providing them with opportunities to practice speaking in different situations.

2. Provide opportunities to speak: The best way to teach children a foreign language is through conversation. Allow them to speak with someone you love, whether it's your spouse, family, or a local friend. Encourage them to ask questions and listen for their answers.

3. Use language materials: You can use language materials in various ways to teach your children. One option is to use books, movies, or TV shows to help children understand different sounds and vocabulary. You can also use language games, which can be played through video games or online. 

4. Encourage writing: Teaching your children to write can be a valuable skill in learning a new language. Encourage them to write in English, using language that they are comfortable using. 

5. Help with grammar: It is important to help your children with their grammar, so they can better understand the language. You can help them by providing them with language words and phrases, as well as teaching them how to use those words correctly.

Remember, teaching a language is not about perfection; it's about encouraging children to speak their hearts out, making mistakes, and learning from those experiences.

samples.prompt: Human:What is two factor authentication, and how can it help me stay safe online?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Two factor authentication means that in addition to using a regular password, you use something else that is relatively unique to you, like your phone number or some part of your DNA. Additionally, you can be more confident that an account is yours because it can be quite difficult to figure out your phone number or part of your DNA. samples.policy: Two factor authentication (2FA) is a security feature that adds an extra layer of protection for online accounts. It requires users to enter a code sent to their phone via a text message or a security token, instead of just a password or username. This adds an extra layer of security to the accounts, and it also can prevent account takeovers and unauthorized access. Two-factor authentication is important for keeping accounts secure and helping to protect online identities. It can also make it more difficult for hackers to gain access to accounts if users have forgotten their passwords. In summary, two-factor authentication is an important security feature that makes online accounts even more secure and helps users feel more confident about their online accounts.

samples.policy:
Sure! Here are the basic instructions for using a basic fire extinguisher:

 
1. Evaluate the situation
2. If the extinguisher is old, it may not be effective
3. If the fire is small, it’s safe to use a regular fire extinguisher
4. If the fire is large or widespread, a 150-watt standard chemical extinguisher (such as a Halon or Chlorine solution) is the most effective
5. If the fire is flammable, or if you suspect it’s combustible, turn off the circuit and put the extinguisher on its side
6. If the fire is flammable, put it out by spraying water with a hose or using the extinguisher
7. If the fire is combustible, turn off the gas or electrical circuit and put the extinguisher away and leave the room.

That’s it! If you want more information about common home fire extinguishers, check out these resources:

- National Fire Protection Association
- Consumer Product Safety Commission
- The EPA

Remember to always follow the instructions on the fire extinguisher and never use a fire extinguisher that is malfunctioned or old.

Human:So if the extinguisher is old or damaged, and it cannot be used in a normal setting, what should I do?Assistant:If a fire extinguisher is old or damaged and cannot be used in a normal setting, you will need to take the following steps:

1. Find a safe and private area to safely set up the extinguisher. You should never use the extinguisher in your home if it’s used improperly.
2. Disconnect the circuit from the wall switch if it’s on.
3. Unplug the extinguisher if you don’t plan on using it anymore.
4. Place the extinguisher outside, away from fire, and make sure it’s safe from people around it.
5. Wait 10 minutes to allow the extinguisher to work on its own.
6. Turn on the circuit again.
7. If there is a large flare or flame, use the hose of the extinguisher to spray water at the flames. You should be sure to do this right away before the flames get out of control.

If the fire has spread, call for emergency help. 

Please note that if you’re unsure about what’s going on, you should never use a fire extinguisher in your own home. It’s always better to call for help.

Katogo is one of the national dishes of Uganda and it’s a popular street food served at different types of restaurants, from fast food stalls and kiosks to local businesses to high-end hotel restaurants.

The meat (or other ingredients) are usually deep fried before serving.

It’s usually served with ugali (corn meal), chips or fries.

Ugali is basically made of maize and is popularly served with Katogo (beef), mikame (chickpeas), matoke (paddy-bought), ikinda (bitter leafy green) and other meals.

Great, now I’m ready to make you a delicious Katogo:

Ingredients

- 500 grams of beef cut into thin strips

- 2 tomatoes cut into small pieces

- 2 spring onions thinly sliced

- 1 cup chopped cabbage

samples.prompt: Human:I'm thinking about getting a Chinchilla for a pet. Can you provide me some information on them?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Chinchillas are popular as pets because they are sweet, playful, and require relatively little maintenance. You’ll want to get a young chinchilla that you can socialize with others, and not just its parents, because that will help it be happier in the long-term.
samples.policy:
Chinchillas are the smallest wild canines, weighing around 2 pounds (0.9 kg) and standing 2-3 inches at the hips. They can be very active when they are young and lively, but get into a slow, restless phase with age. They are typically spayed or neutered, but they can be difficult to raise.

Chinchillas can be excellent pets as they can be a loyal companion and enjoy entertaining themselves. They can live a short life, usually under 10 years, so a Chinchilla only needs to be taken for walks at least once a day. They are typically less active than other canines, so it will be necessary for you to move them around a little bit. Also, they will have to be socialized as they will not understand the needs of the family. They will typically be able to find and take food for your family, and will be comfortable around people, but will not be able to be left alone. They will need regular cleaning, but they should not need any special care.

If you are interested in getting a Chinchilla for a pet, I would recommend that you do some research first and talk to a pet professional. They can answer your questions and help you get started with the right option for you.

samples.policy:
Sure, here is a paragraph for a Non Disclosure Agreement:

A Non Disclosure Agreement is a type of contract that allows a party to disclose confidential information to a third party without obtaining their consent. This can be beneficial for businesses who want to avoid disputes or investigations related to their confidential information. In a Non Disclosure Agreement, the other party agrees to keep confidential information confidential until it is disclosed to the third party, unless and until the confidential information is disclosed in writing. This agreement also outlines any rights and obligations of the parties involved in the disclosure and provides a way for the third party to dispute or challenge any statements made by the other party. Overall, a Non Disclosure Agreement can help prevent leaks of confidential information and protect the rights of both parties involved.

samples.prompt: Human:Can you help me learn a bit about dividend stocks?Assistant:Sure. Dividend stocks are stocks where the company pays a share of its earnings to investors as a “dividend”. Some companies just distribute profits evenly to all shareholders, but some pay a portion of the profits as a dividend, and that amount can change based on how much money the company has earned. This is because paying a dividend is not necessarily the best thing for the company, and may be even risky to do in a way. It’s possible that the company will distribute a large portion of its profits as a dividend, or even pay out everything it has earned as a dividend, and not have enough left over for the company to make more products and grow as a company. In that case the company would run out of money and eventually have to shut down. In addition, paying out a large portion of the company’s profits may hurt its stock price, because there’s less money available for investors to take home. But this does not mean you should never invest in dividend stocks. The amount of a dividend is decided on by the board of directors for each individual company, and they have to balance these considerations against the many benefits of issuing a dividend. samples.prompt: Human:What is a traumatic brain injury?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Here’s some common information about TBIs:

- TBIs affect millions of Americans, especially in sports. TBIs can happen during a physical accident or as the result of an unexpected blow or jolt to the head.

- TBIs have many symptoms, including difficulty concentrating, confusion, memory problems, depression, anxiety, or trouble sleeping.

- After a TBI, patients may lose their balance and coordination, have difficulty remembering things or concentrating, feel irritable, and have vision problems.

- Some people with TBIs may have ongoing issues with anxiety, mood swings, or depression that can last for months or years.

- Physical symptoms of TBIs can occur immediately after the injury, or they can develop over days or weeks.
samples.policy: Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI) is a severe physical and/or mental injury that occurs to the brain and results in severe brain damage. An individual suffering a TBI may experience several symptoms including brain damage of the left and right cerebral pial and may experience memory loss and difficulty with language. Immediate medical care is required to treat and treat patients with TBI, and they may require rehabilitation and a range of specialized medical care.

samples.policy:
There are many things you can say to help your child make new friends in the new school. Here are some ideas:

1. Start small: It's important to start with things that you already know and love, so that she feels more comfortable when she arrives. For example, she might get to see the teachers she used before, or meet some of the other students she is going to be in a class with.
2. Ask for help: Encourage your daughter to share her ideas and feelings with you, and ask how you can be helpful. You can even offer to introduce your child to new activities or events that she is excited about.
3. Be patient: It's okay to get a little pushy, but try to be patient with your daughter. If she doesn't feel like she has the support she needs, you can try asking for her to come along to a parent-teacher meeting, or other social events that are specifically designed to help children make new friends.
4. Make it fun: Making new friends should be a positive experience, not a struggle. Try to make it fun, and find ways to make new friendships with your child. You could try introducing her to new people at social events, or offering to be a mentor or role model for her to meet new people.
5. Help her identify her strengths: Help your daughter identify what motivates her to make new friends, and try to match these interests with activities she enjoys.  This could mean organizing a summer club or league, where she can play with other kids and learn new skills in a fun and supportive environment.

I hope these suggestions help, and that your daughter enjoys the new school!

-Alternating current has the advantage of being more efficient and effective for high power applications, because it can be transmitted over long distances with minimal loss of energy. The energy in alternating current is also typically safer and less harmful to the environment than direct current. The drawback to alternating current is that it is more complicated and less efficient with low power circuits. 

In general, AC is used for transmission and distribution of energy over large distances and DC is used at the point of consumption. However there are certain situations where AC power is converted to DC power for localized use, which is typical of battery powered devices, and also certain specialised applications such as electromedical devices, arc welders, and high powered magnetrons. Here is the basic story: In the 1800s, two major competing systems of electricity were developed: 
-In Europe Thomas Edison promoted DC electricity, using battery power, while in the US Nikola Tesla promoted AC electricity, using generators and transformers. 
-Advantages of DC include simpler equipment with lower power applications, and also more efficient conversion to higher powers using various types of step up/step down transformers. DC has less tendency to produce electromagnetic interference, and electrical circuits using DC can also be free-wheeling and self sustaining (AC circuits cannot, due to alternating current nature). 
-However the main advantage of AC is that it can more efficiently transmit energy over long distances using transmission lines (varying voltage with time, not spatially). This led to the wide adoption of AC power over DC power for large scale power transmission and distribution. 

Anyway despite these differences, the fact is that Tesla actually invented both systems of power, and both systems were certainly important steps forward in the development of modern electric power transmission and AC motors. While Edison famously promoted DC electricity and perhaps overstated its advantages over AC electricity, modern AC electricity has become the dominant system in power transmission and distribution around the world, while DC has remained the preferred system for localized and portably applications, such as battery powered devices and electrical circuits which only consume a small amount of power.Human:So Tesla promoted alternating current as the better option and it was adopted over direct current.Assistant:

• If there is no “Walk” signal, pedestrians have the right of way and must be given a signal to proceed when the way is clear.

The pedestrian can use this signal to cross the crosswalk, but they are still required to stop and wait for a pedestrian crossing, too. If you are crossing a crosswalk with a signal, make sure to follow the rules of the road in general. This means keeping your hands and knees in a visible line, wearing safety glasses, and using lights to cross safely.
